name: Armored Craft Tank Battle 3D
description:
Let us intoduce you our last game: Pixel Tank Batlles! Pixel Tank Battles represents a pure action and guarantees the ultimate battle-tanking experience!

Hey rookie, welcome to the pixel wars! The main purpose in this game is to destroy enemy war tanks while running through a total war zone.

HOW TO PLAY: Use the 4-way arrow button to control your vehicle. Tap the FIRE button to shoot at enemies.

Game features:
-tank driving simulator
-third person shooter
-original war machine models
-cool cube graphics
-free app to download

Have fun with Pixel Tank Battles! The time of the decisive battle has come!
